channel.title: My first script! a power cutter

item.title: My first script! a power cutter
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

[/php]procedure RandomTalk;
var
t: integer;

begin
if (RandomTalking) = True then
t := random(50) + 1;
begin
if (t = 1) then
typesend(‘wood cutting lvls everyoen’ + chr(13));
if (t = 2) then
typesend(‘aw man how come i never get a random event’ + chr(13))
if (t = 3) then
typesend(‘i cant wait until the end of school year’ + chr(13))
if (t = 4) then
typesend(‘i cant wait till i can chop yews’ + chr(13))
if (t = 5) then
typesend(‘cool’ + chr(13))
if (t = 6) then
sendkeyssilent(‘how long have you been woodcutting’ + chr(13))
if (t = 7) then
typesend(‘is anyone else bored of wcing’ + chr(13))
if (t = 8) then
typesend(‘allmost at my next lvl yay’ + chr(13))
if (t = 9) then
typesend(‘nice woodcutting axe d00d’ + chr(13))
if (t = 10) then
typesend(‘wow im soooo boreddd’ + chr(13))
if (t = 11) then
typesend(‘please dont let the wizards kill me’ + chr(13))
end;
end;[php]

Most of the time that won’t say anything -.-! Try this:

[php]

procedure RandomTalk;
var
t: integer;

begin
if (RandomTalking) = True then
t := random(10) + 1;
begin
if (t = 1) then
typesend(‘wood cutting lvls everyoen’ + chr(13));
if (t = 2) then
typesend(‘aw man how come i never get a random event’ + chr(13))
if (t = 3) then
typesend(‘i cant wait until the end of school year’ + chr(13))
if (t = 4) then
typesend(‘i cant wait till i can chop yews’ + chr(13))
if (t = 5) then
typesend(‘cool’ + chr(13))
if (t = 6) then
sendkeyssilent(‘how long have you been woodcutting’ + chr(13))
if (t = 7) then
typesend(‘is anyone else bored of wcing’ + chr(13))
if (t = 8) then
typesend(‘allmost at my next lvl yay’ + chr(13))
if (t = 9) then
typesend(‘nice woodcutting axe d00d’ + chr(13))
if (t = 10) then
typesend(‘wow im soooo boreddd’ + chr(13))
if (t = 11) then
typesend(‘please dont let the wizards kill me’ + chr(13))
end;
end;[/php]

That has a chance to say everything except 1

Read full topic

item.source: My first script! a power cutter

item.title: My first script! a power cutter
item.dc:creator: @t3hl33tn00b t3hl33tn00b
item.description:
@t3hl33tn00b wrote:

VERSION 1.2
this version has

  • a working fight detector
  • updated anti randoms
  • cleaner main loop
  • updated and made the chopping procedure better
  • made some failsafes in the chopping procedure
    -added a random talking feature to make it less suspicious!

NEXT VERSION SHOULD HAVE (but not limited to) the following

  • an auto responder (EXAMPLE: someone says “wc lvls?” the script will auto respond with your wc lvl)
  • BETTER anti randoms
  • a MUCH better progress report
  • will most likely support more than one user
  • auto detection if your dead lol
    -and much more

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = PowerChopper

Author = t3hl33tn00b

Description = a power chopper

Version = 1.2

Date = 12/29/2007

Comments = no stealing

/Script Info}
program PowerCutter;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\woodcutting.scar}
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// by Zinq12 //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Please dont use good armor while running this because//
// i dont want you to have to lose ur armor //
// and please keep in mind that this is my first //
// script so dont expect it to be perfect ok? //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// WARNING! I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR IF YOU GET BANNED //
// NOR DO I WANT ANY COMPLAINTS OF YOU GETTING BANNED //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// SETUP //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const //
TreeColor = 4890768; //put the color of the tree you want to cut //
TreeColor2 = 4483168; //another color on the same type of tree for backup //
TreeColor3 = 2656376; //yet another color on the tree //
TypeOfTree = ‘Willow’; //the type of tree you are chopping //
ChopTime = 3500; //put how long it would take you to chop down the specific tree //
SkillForLamp = ‘woodcutting’; //type the skill you want the script to use a lamp on //
StartPlayer = 0; //
RunAway = ‘E’; // type N, S, E, W , for the direction you want to run if you get into a fight//
RandomTalking = True; // put true if you want it to say random words (i highly suggest it)
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// DO NOT TOUCH BELOW!!! //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
var
NumberOfLogsChopped: Integer;
{///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//DO NOT TOUCH BELOW UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT THE HECK YOUR DOING!//
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
Players[0].Name := ‘’; //your login name
Players[0].Pass := ‘’; //your pass
Players[0].Nick := ‘’; //type in three letters from your name EXCEPT FOR THE FIRST 3
Players[0].Active := True; //True for if your using this player(i only have support for one atm so dont mess with it)
Lampskill := SkillForLamp
end;

procedure AntiRandoms; //work in progress >_>

begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘uh oh im in a fight! =,(’)

RunAwayDirection(RunAway);

Writeln('running away :) ')
  Wait(1000 + random(462));
RunBack;
Writeln('running back to the trees.')

end;

if (FindNewBox) then
begin
Writeln(‘darn it a box!’)
wait(500)
OpenBox;
SolveBox;
wait(4300 + random(200));
end;

if (FindNewBox) then
begin
writeln(‘omg another box!’);
OpenBox;
wait(700 + random(250))
SolveBox;
wait(4300 + random(200));
end;

if (FindNewBox) then
begin
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘sorry im logging out because i dont want you banned!’)
TerminateScript;
end;

if (FindLamp(SkillForLamp)) then
begin
Writeln(‘genie random found! attempting to solve…’);
SolveGenie(SkillForLamp);
end;
end;

procedure RandomTalk;
var
t: integer;

begin
if (RandomTalking) = True then
t := random(50) + 1;
begin
if (t = 1) then
typesend(‘wood cutting lvls everyoen’ + chr(13));
if (t = 2) then
typesend(‘aw man how come i never get a random event’ + chr(13))
if (t = 3) then
typesend(‘i cant wait until the end of school year’ + chr(13))
if (t = 4) then
typesend(‘i cant wait till i can chop yews’ + chr(13))
if (t = 5) then
typesend(‘cool’ + chr(13))
if (t = 6) then
sendkeyssilent(‘how long have you been woodcutting’ + chr(13))
if (t = 7) then
typesend(‘is anyone else bored of wcing’ + chr(13))
if (t = 8) then
typesend(‘allmost at my next lvl yay’ + chr(13))
if (t = 9) then
typesend(‘nice woodcutting axe d00d’ + chr(13))
if (t = 10) then
typesend(‘wow im soooo boreddd’ + chr(13))
if (t = 11) then
typesend(‘please dont let the wizards kill me’ + chr(13))
end;
end;

procedure Chop;
var
ChopMark: Integer;
begin

repeat

Wait(1000 + random(462));
if (FindColorSpiral(x, y, TreeColor, 3, 3, 513, 339)) or
  (FindColorSpiral(x, y, TreeColor2, 3, 3, 513, 339)) or
  (FindColorSpiral(x, y, TreeColor3, 3, 3, 513, 339)) then
  MMouse(x, y, 3, 3);
Wait(300 + random(262));
if IsUpText('Chop down' + TypeOfTree) then
  wait(200 + random(105))
    Mouse(x, y, 4, 4, true)
    flag;
RandomTalk;
AntiRandoms;
if (FindFight) then
begin
  Writeln('uh oh im in a fight! :( ')

  RunAwayDirection(RunAway);

  Writeln('running away :) ')
    Wait(1500 + random(562));
  RunBack;
  Writeln('running back to the trees.')
end;
FindEnt(TreeColor);
wait(200)
  FindEnt(TreeColor2);
wait(200)
  FindHead;
MarkTime(chopMark)
  repeat
  wait(Random(150) + Random(500) + 100)
    FindNormalRandoms;
until ((not IsUpText('Chop Down' + TypeOfTree)) or (TimeFromMark(chopMark) >= ChopTime));

until (invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
end;

procedure DropLogs;

begin
MouseSpeed := 10 + random(5)
DropTo(2, 15)
FindNormalRandoms;
wait(1000 + random(426));
DropTo(16, 28)
NumberOfLogsChopped := NumberOfLogsChopped + 27
end;

procedure FindAxeHead;

begin
Writeln(‘checking for axe head’)
FindHead;
end;
//do i need this procedure??

procedure Report;

begin
Writeln(’ You have currently chopped: ’ + inttostr(NumberOfLogsChopped))
Writeln(’ End of Report, (i will add more stuff in later versions!’)
end;

procedure Setup; // no, this is not a setup for you so dont touch it!
begin
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
CurrentPlayer := StartPlayer;
MouseSpeed := 10;
FindNormalRandoms;
FindAxeHeadColor;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
Setup;
repeat
Chop;
wait(5000 + random(200));
AntiRandoms;
wait(700 + random(150));
DropLogs;
wait(700 + random(150));
Report;
wait(700 + random(150));
until (false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: My first script! a power cutter

item.title: My first script! a power cutter
item.dc:creator: @Muchuchu Muchuchu
item.description:
@Muchuchu wrote:

Had a couple mistakes, fixed it for ya.

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = PowerChopper

Author = t3hl33tn00b

Description = a power chopper

Version = 1

Date = 12/29/2007

Comments = no stealing

/Script Info}
program PowerCutter;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\woodcutting.scar}
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// by Zinq12 //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Please dont use good armor while running this because//
// i dont want you to have to lose ur armor //
// and please keep in mind that this is my first //
// script so dont expect it to be perfect ok? //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// WARNING! I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR IF YOU GET BANNED //
// NOR DO I WANT ANY COMPLAINTS OF YOU GETTING BANNED //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// SETUP //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const //
TreeColor = 3696736; //put the color of the tree you want to cut //
TreeColor2 = 2322536; //another color on the same type of tree for backup //
TreeColor3 = 2453600; //yet another color on the tree //
TypeOfTree = ‘Willow’;//the type of tree you are chopping //
ChopTime = 1500;//put how long it would take you to chop down the specific tree //
SkillForLamp = ‘woodcutting’;//type the skill you want the script to use a lamp on //
StartPlayer = 0; //
RunAway = ‘N’ // type N S E W , for the direction you want to run if you get into a fight//
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// DO NOT TOUCH BELOW!!! //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //
;var
NumberOfLogsChopped: Integer;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers:=1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
Players[0].Name :=’ ‘;//your login name
Players[0].Pass :=’ ‘;//your pass
Players[0].Nick :=’ ';//type in three letters from your name EXCEPT FOR THE FIRST 3
Players[0].Active := True;//True for if your using this player(i only have support for one atm so dont mess with it

end;

Procedure Chop;
begin

repeat
Wait(1000+random(462));
if (FindColorSpiral(x,y,TreeColor,3,3,513,339))or
(FindColorSpiral(x,y,TreeColor2,3,3,513,339))or
(FindColorSpiral(x,y,TreeColor3,3,3,513,339))then
Writeln(‘ok found the trees’);
MMouse(x,y,3,3);
Wait(600+random(462));
if IsUpText(TypeOfTree) then
wait(500+random(55))
FindEnt(TreeColor)
FindEnt(TreeColor2)
FindEnt(TreeColor3)
Mouse(x,y,4,4,true)
Writeln(‘chopping…’);
flag;
wait(1600+random(394))
FindNormalRandoms;

Until(invfull)
If (invfull=true) Then
end;

Procedure AntiRandoms;//work in progress >_>

begin
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘uh oh im in a fight! =,(’)

RunAwayDirection(RunAway);

Writeln('running away ')
Wait(1000+random(462));
RunBack;
Writeln(‘running back to the trees.’)

end;

If (FindNewBox) Then
begin
Writeln(‘darn it a box!’)
wait(500)
OpenBox;
SolveBox;
wait(4300+random(200));
end;

If (FindNewBox) Then
begin
writeln(‘omg another box!’);
OpenBox;
wait(700+random(250))
SolveBox;
wait(4300+random(200));
end;

If (FindNewBox) Then
begin
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) Then
Begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘sorry im logging out because i dont want you banned!’)
TerminateScript;
end;

If (FindLamp(SkillForLamp)) Then
Begin
Writeln(‘genie random found! attempting to solve…’);
SolveGenie(SkillForLamp);
end;
end;

Procedure DropLogs;

Begin
MouseSpeed:= 10+random(8)
DropTo(2,15)
FindNormalRandoms;
wait(1000+random(426));
DropTo(16,28)
NumberOfLogsChopped:=NumberOfLogsChopped+27
end;

Procedure FindAxeHead;

begin
Writeln(‘checking for axe head’)
FindHead;
end;
//do i need this procedure??

Procedure Report;

Begin
Writeln(’ You have currently chopped: ‘+inttostr(NumberOfLogsChopped))
Writeln(’ End of Report, (i will add more stuff in later versions!’)
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
SetupSRL;
FindNormalRandoms;
FindAxeHeadColor;
FindHead;
Repeat
Chop;
FindAxeHead;
AntiRandoms;
DropLogs;
Report;
until(false)
end.[/code]

item.title: My first script! a power cutter
item.dc:creator: @t3hl33tn00b t3hl33tn00b
item.description:
@t3hl33tn00b wrote:

[code][code]

{.Script Info:

ScriptName = PowerChopper

Author = t3hl33tn00b

Description = a power chopper

Version = 1.2

Date = 12/29/2007

Comments = no stealing

/Script Info}
program PowerCutter;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\woodcutting.scar}
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// by Zinq12 //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Please dont use good armor while running this because//
// i dont want you to have to lose ur armor //
// and please keep in mind that this is my first //
// script so dont expect it to be perfect ok? //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// WARNING! I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR IF YOU GET BANNED //
// NOR DO I WANT ANY COMPLAINTS OF YOU GETTING BANNED //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// SETUP //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const //
TreeColor = 4489328; //put the color of the tree you want to cut //
TreeColor2 = 7116968; //another color on the same type of tree for backup //
TreeColor3 = 3756104; //yet another color on the tree //
TypeOfTree = ‘Willow’; //the type of tree you are chopping //
ChopTime = 3500; //put how long it would take you to chop down the specific tree //
SkillForLamp = ‘woodcutting’; //type the skill you want the script to use a lamp on //
StartPlayer = 0; //
RunAway = ‘E’; // type N, S, E, W , for the direction you want to run if you get into a fight//
RandomTalking = True; // put true if you want it to say random words (i highly suggest it)
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// DO NOT TOUCH BELOW!!! //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
var
NumberOfLogsChopped: Integer;
{///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//DO NOT TOUCH BELOW UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT THE HECK YOUR DOING!//
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
Players[0].Name := ‘’; //your login name
Players[0].Pass := ‘’; //your pass
Players[0].Nick := ‘’; //type in three letters from your name EXCEPT FOR THE FIRST 3
Players[0].Active := True; //True for if your using this player(i only have support for one atm so dont mess with it)
Lampskill := SkillForLamp
end;

procedure AntiRandoms; //work in progress >_>

begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘uh oh im in a fight! =,(’)

RunAwayDirection(RunAway);

Writeln('running away :) ')
  Wait(1000 + random(462));
RunBack;
Writeln('running back to the trees.')

end;

if (FindNewBox) then
begin
Writeln(‘darn it a box!’)
wait(500)
OpenBox;
SolveBox;
wait(4300 + random(200));
end;

if (FindNewBox) then
begin
writeln(‘omg another box!’);
OpenBox;
wait(700 + random(250))
SolveBox;
wait(4300 + random(200));
end;

if (FindNewBox) then
begin
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘sorry im logging out because i dont want you banned!’)
TerminateScript;
end;

if (FindLamp(SkillForLamp)) then
begin
Writeln(‘genie random found! attempting to solve…’);
SolveGenie(SkillForLamp);
end;
end;

procedure RandomTalk;
var
t: integer;

begin
if (RandomTalking) = True then
t := random(100) + 1;
begin
if (t = 1) then
typesend(‘wood cutting lvls everyoen’ + chr(13));
if (t = 2) then
typesend(‘aw man how come i never get a random event’ + chr(13))
if (t = 3) then
typesend(‘i cant wait until the end of school year’ + chr(13))
if (t = 4) then
typesend(‘i cant wait till i can chop yews’ + chr(13))
if (t = 5) then
typesend(‘cool’ + chr(13))
if (t = 6) then
sendkeyssilent(‘how long have you been woodcutting’ + chr(13))
if (t = 7) then
typesend(‘is anyone else bored of wcing’ + chr(13))
if (t = 8) then
typesend(‘allmost at my next lvl yay’ + chr(13))
if (t = 9) then
typesend(‘nice woodcutting axe d00d’ + chr(13))
if (t = 10) then
typesend(‘wow im soooo boreddd’ + chr(13))
if (t = 11) then
typesend(‘please dont let the wizards kill me’ + chr(13))
end;
end;

procedure FindTehEnt;

begin

if (FindColorTolerance(x, y, 515029, 1, 1, 180, 39, 20)) or
(findcolorspiraltolerance(x, y, 65535, 1, 1, 200, 40, 20)) then begin
Writeln(‘Ent found’);
sendkeys(‘stupid ent…’)
wait(2000)
exit;
end;
end;

procedure Chop;
var
ChopMark: Integer;
begin

repeat
Wait(1000 + random(462));
if (FindColorSpiral(x, y, TreeColor, 3, 3, 513, 339)) or
(FindColorSpiral(x, y, TreeColor2, 3, 3, 513, 339)) or
(FindColorSpiral(x, y, TreeColor3, 3, 3, 513, 339)) then
MMouse(x, y, 3, 3);
Wait(300 + random(262));
if IsUpText(‘Chop down’ + TypeOfTree) then
FindEnt(TreeColor);
wait(200)
FindEnt(TreeColor2);
wait(200)
FindTehEnt;
Mouse(x, y, 4, 4, true)
flag;
RandomTalk;
AntiRandoms;
if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln('uh oh im in a fight! ')

  RunAwayDirection(RunAway);

  Writeln('running away :) ')
    Wait(1500 + random(562));
  RunBack;
  Writeln('running back to the trees.')
end;
FindHead;
MarkTime(chopMark)
  repeat
  wait(Random(150) + Random(500) + 100)
    FindNormalRandoms;
until ((not IsUpText('Chop Down' + TypeOfTree)) or (TimeFromMark(chopMark) >= ChopTime));

until (invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
end;

procedure DropLogs;

begin
MouseSpeed := 10 + random(5)
DropTo(2, 15)
FindNormalRandoms;
wait(1000 + random(426));
DropTo(16, 28)
NumberOfLogsChopped := NumberOfLogsChopped + 27
end;

procedure FindAxeHead;

begin
Writeln(‘checking for axe head’)
FindHead;
end;
//do i need this procedure??

procedure Report;

begin
Writeln(’ You have currently chopped: ’ + inttostr(NumberOfLogsChopped))
Writeln(’ End of Report, (i will add more stuff in later versions!’)
end;

procedure Setup; // no, this is not a setup for you so dont touch it!
begin
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
CurrentPlayer := StartPlayer;
MouseSpeed := 10;
FindNormalRandoms;
FindAxeHeadColor;
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
Setup;
repeat
Chop;
wait(5000 + random(200));
AntiRandoms;
wait(700 + random(150));
DropLogs;
wait(700 + random(150));
Report;
wait(700 + random(150));
until (false)
end.[/code]
the script above is version 1.2 ) also its neater lol

here is v1

{.Script Info:
# ScriptName  = PowerChopper
# Author      = t3hl33tn00b
# Description = a power chopper
# Version     = 1
# Date        = 12/29/2007
# Comments    = no stealing :)
/Script Info}
program PowerCutter;
{.include srl\srl.scar}
{.include srl\srl\skill\woodcutting.scar}
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//                    by Zinq12                      //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Please dont use good armor while running this because//
//    i dont want you to have to lose ur armor :P       //
//    and please keep in mind that this is my first     //
//   script so dont expect it to be perfect ok?         //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//  WARNING! I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR IF YOU GET BANNED //
//  NOR DO I WANT ANY COMPLAINTS OF YOU GETTING BANNED  //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//                            SETUP                                                     //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const                                                                                   //
TreeColor  = 3696736; //put the color of the tree you want to cut                       //
TreeColor2 = 2322536; //another color on the same type of tree for backup               //
TreeColor3 = 2453600;  //yet another color on the tree                                  //
TypeOfTree = 'Willow';//the type of tree you are chopping                               //
ChopTime = 1500;//put how long it would take you to chop down the specific tree         //
SkillForLamp = 'woodcutting';//type the skill you want the script to use a lamp on      //
StartPlayer = 0;                                                                        //
RunAway = 'N' // type N S E W , for the direction you want to run if you get into a fight//
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//                     **DO NOT TOUCH BELOW!!!!!**                            //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////                                                 //
var
NumberOfLogsChopped: Integer;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
     HowManyPlayers:=1;
     NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
     Players[0].Name     :=' ';//your login name
     Players[0].Pass     :=' ';//your pass
     Players[0].Nick     :=' ';//type in three letters from your name EXCEPT FOR THE FIRST 3
     Players[0].Active   := True;//True for if your using this player(i only have support for one atm so dont mess with it

end;

Procedure Chop;
begin

 repeat
   Wait(1000+random(462));
    if (FindColorSpiral(x,y,TreeColor,3,3,513,339))or
       (FindColorSpiral(x,y,TreeColor2,3,3,513,339))or
       (FindColorSpiral(x,y,TreeColor3,3,3,513,339))then
          Writeln('ok found the trees');
          MMouse(x,y,3,3);
     Wait(600+random(462));
  if  IsUpText(TypeOfTree) then
  wait(500+random(55))
  FindEnt(TreeColor)
  FindEntTreeColor2)
  FindEnt(TreeColor3)
       Mouse(x,y,4,4,true)
       Writeln('chopping...');
       flag;
    wait(1600+random(394))
     FindNormalRandoms;
     
  Until(invfull)
If (invfull=true) Then
end;

Procedure AntiRandoms;//work in progress >_>

begin
  if (FindFight) then
begin
 Writeln('uh oh im in a fight! =,(')
 
 RunAwayDirection(RunAway);
 
 Writeln('running away :) ')
 Wait(1000+random(462));
 RunBack;
 Writeln('running back to the trees.')
 
 end;
 
 If (FindNewBox) Then
begin
 Writeln('darn it a box!')
  wait(500)
  OpenBox;
  SolveBox;
  wait(4300+random(200));
  end;
  
 If (FindNewBox) Then
begin
writeln('omg another box!');
  OpenBox;
  wait(700+random(250))
  SolveBox;
  wait(4300+random(200));
end;

If (FindNewBox) Then
begin
   GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) Then
Begin
 LogOut;
 Writeln('sorry im logging out because i dont want you banned!')
 TerminateScript;
end;

If (FindLamp(SkillForLamp)) Then
Begin
   Writeln('genie random found! attempting to solve...');
   SolveGenie(SkillForLamp);
end;
end;
 
Procedure DropLogs;

Begin
    MouseSpeed:= 10+random(8)
    DropTo(2,15)
    FindNormalRandoms;
    wait(1000+random(426));
    DropTo(16,28)
    NumberOfLogsChopped:=NumberOfLogsChopped+27
end;

Procedure FindAxeHead;

 begin
   Writeln('checking for axe head')
   FindHead;
end;
//do i need this procedure??

Procedure Report;

Begin
     Writeln(' You have currently chopped: '+inttostr(NumberOfLogsChopped))
     Writeln(' End of Report, (i will add more stuff in later versions!')
end;

begin
ActivateClient;
  ClearDebug;
  SetupSRL;
  FindNormalRandoms;
  FindAxeHeadColor;
  FindHead;
Repeat
 Chop;
 FindAxeHead;
 AntiRandoms;
 DropLogs;
 Report;
until(false)
end.

[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 12:47:07 AM[/size][hr]ALSO, when running the script it will chop all well and good, and then drop, but after it drops, it will lag severely then rs will log out >_> anyone know why my script is doing that? and any other help would be GREATLY appreciated.[/code]
